translation.en: Netflix.
I can't! Whoa!
♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Clap your hands and stamp your feet ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.es: Pisa fuerte, aplaude ya Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ Come with us and you will meet ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.es: Ven y lo conocerás Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ Full of joy and processed meat ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
♪ Wiener, winner ♪ ♪ Pinky! ♪
♪ Super- friendly hot dog wiener ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.es: Amigable es la salchicha Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ But not the kind you had for dinner ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.es: No es la que hay en la comida Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ An awesome, bright- pink wiener winner ♪ ♪ Pinky Malinky! ♪
translation.es: Sensacional es ella siempre Pinky Malinky

translation.en: ♪ Wiener! Winner! Wiener! Winner! ♪ ♪ Wiener! Winner! Wiener! Winner! ♪
translation.es: La salchicha valiente La salchicha valiente

translation.en: ♪ Pinky Malinky, yeah! ♪
Did you get that?
Hey, JJ, what's going on? Why aren't you getting changed?
translation.es: JJ, ¿qué pasa? ¿Por qué no te cambias?

translation.en: There's something weird going on over by my locker.
translation.es: Pasa algo raro junto a mi casillero.

translation.en: - What do you mean? - I'll show you.
Look, I'll do it again.
- - See what I mean?
Every single time.
Yeah. That is weird, bro.
Today's Would You Rather:
Would you rather have a giant third eyeball in your forehead
translation.es: ¿Preferirías tener un gran tercer ojo en tu frente

translation.en: or have lobster claws for hands? Babs?
translation.es: o pinzas de langosta en vez de manos? ¿Babs?

translation.en: Uh, do the lobster claws come with super strength?
- Nope. - Third eyeball all the way, bro.
translation.es: - No. - El tercer ojo sin duda.

translation.en: Really? I thought you'd be more of a lobster-- - Stop. - Huh?
- Stop. - Oh!
- Stop. - Talking stop sign?
translation.es: - Alto. - ¿Una señal de alto que habla?

translation.en: The robots are here.
Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop...
So, when did they put this in?
Yeah, I saw them installing it last night.
Why? What was wrong with the old one?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? ¿Qué tenía de malo la vieja?

translation.en: I don't know. It was old, I guess.
Hmm. Hmm.
Welcome to Episode One of Bob's Road Safety Ride- Along!
translation.es: Bienvenidos al episodio uno de Seguridad Vial de Bob en el Camino.

translation.en: Today, I'm going to teach you all about staying safe and distraction- free on the road.
translation.es: Hoy les enseñaré a estar seguros y no distraerse en la carretera.

translation.en: I've got six different cameras installed to make sure we don't miss anything I say.
translation.es: Tengo seis cámaras instaladas para que no nos perdamos nada.

translation.en: There's even one in the trunk. What- what?
translation.es: Incluso hay una en el maletero. ¿Qué?

translation.en: Okay, let's go!
- Stop. Stop. Stop... -
- New stop sign! -
Aw, yeah!
Out with the old, in with the new, boy!
translation.es: ¡Que salga lo viejo y entre lo nuevo!

translation.en: - Stop. Stop. Stop... - Stop!
- Out with the old, in with the new? - Yeah, bo- bo- boy!
translation.es: - ¿Que salga lo viejo y entre lo nuevo? - ¡Sí!

translation.en: I mean, I'm all for modernization, like the time I designed a solar- powered suit.
translation.es: Estoy a favor de la modernización, como la vez que diseñé un traje solar.

translation.en: I liked the old one. It was a perfectly good stop sign.
translation.es: Me gustaba la vieja. Era una señal de alto perfecta.

translation.en: I mean, come on, it's been in most of the videos we've shot around here.
translation.es: Estuvo en la mayoría de nuestros videos.

translation.en: Winter in Sackenhack!
Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot! Hot!
We used to give it hats - for all the holidays. -
translation.es: Le poníamos gorros para las festividades.

translation.en: That old stop sign was cool. It was special to us.
translation.es: Esa vieja señal de alto era genial. Era especial.

translation.en: How many of our other favorite things in Sackenhack are gonna get replaced?
The old whale slide? Or the chinchilla- spank billboards?
translation.es: ¿La vieja ballena tobogán? ¿O los carteles de la nalgada a la chinchilla?

translation.en: All these things have special memories for me and my friends.
translation.es: Todas esas cosas tienen recuerdos especiales.

translation.en: If only there was a way to protect them from changing.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera una forma de evitar que cambien.

translation.en: Beary McBear- Face, Sackenhack's founder.
translation.es: Oso McCara de Oso, fundador de Sackenhack.

translation.en: This is really an important landmark. You can tell by the shiny, gold plaque.
translation.es: Este es un monumento importante. Lo sabes por la placa dorada y brillante.

translation.en: Let's go get some boba.  Mom, you know I'm allergic to boba. Hmm.
translation.es: - Vayamos a beber té boba. - Sabes que soy alérgico a eso.

translation.en: - This is really an important landmark. - Hmm.
Gold plaque.
- Hmm. - Boba. Hmm.
Oh, I know what to do!
- Come on, guys. - Dude, what are we doing out here?
JJ, do you remember that music video we shot in front of this mural?
translation.es: JJ, ¿recuerdas ese video musical que filmamos aquí?

translation.en: Yeah, dog!
♪ Three lil' piggies ♪
♪ Lil' piggies in the city Lil' piggies gettin' jiggy ♪
translation.es: Cerditos en la ciudad Cerditos bailando

translation.en: Well, how would you feel if they painted over this or even knocked the wall down to build a new one?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te sentirías si lo pintaran encima o si derribaran la pared?

translation.en: What? No, bro!
They can't knock down our history. They can't do that.
translation.es: No pueden derribar nuestra historia. No pueden hacerlo.

translation.en: No, they can't.
Not if we make absolutely sure that this landmark is preserved forever. Huh?
translation.es: No si nos aseguramos de que se preserve este sitio por siempre.

translation.en: ♪ How we gonna do that I say, how we gonna do that? ♪
♪ Is you gonna tell me How we do that, baby, do that? ♪
With this. A shiny gold seal showing everyone how important this place is.
translation.es: Con esto. Un sello dorado y brillante que muestra la importancia de este lugar.

translation.en: Whoa, so gold and shiny.
translation.es: Vaya, es muy dorado y brillante.

translation.en: Whoa, that is bright. Respect.
Exactly, JJ. People respect both goldness and shininess.
translation.es: Exacto, JJ. La gente respeta lo que es dorado y brilla.

translation.en: Uh, we put these on all of our favorite places around town,
translation.es: Los pondremos en nuestros lugares favoritos

translation.en: and then people will know to leave them as they are.
translation.es: y la gente sabrá que no debe cambiarlos.

translation.en: That way, we can preserve our Sackenhack just the way it is.
translation.es: Así podremos preservar a nuestro Sackenhack como es.

translation.en: Preserved!
Pinky, I wanna kiss the inside of your hammy mind.
translation.es: Pinky, quiero besar tu mente sabor a  jamón.

translation.en: Aw, Babba- Dabba!
I'm preserving this old phone booth because it's where I first met Todd.
translation.es: Estoy preservando esa cabina telefónica porque allí conocí a Todd.

translation.en: It's very important that Sackenhack doesn't change too much.
translation.es: Es importante que Sackenhack no cambie mucho.

translation.en: So, when the aliens come back, they'll know where to find me.
translation.es: Así los alienígenas sabrán dónde encontrarme.

translation.en: The ski jump.
The most important landmark in Sackenhack - and the foundation of our friendship. -
translation.es: El sitio más importante de Sackenhack y la base de nuestra amistad.

translation.en: We gotta preserve it!
Preserved! Now it'll be safe forever.
- - Uh, let's look from over there.
Like, way over there.
Preserved. Our favorite park bench.
Now, it'll be here forever, along with our favorite view.
translation.es: Estará aquí por siempre con nuestra vista favorita.

translation.en: Guys, you should feel proud.
Our Sackenhack is gonna stay exactly the way we like it.
translation.es: Nuestra Sackenhack seguirá exactamente como nos gusta.

translation.en: I'm going to take a pano to celebrate.
Wait. Uh, what's he doing?
Hey, hey! Wait, wait, wait! - Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! - Huh?
You can't take that!
Hi.  This needs to stay here, where it's always been.
translation.es: Hola. Debe quedarse aquí, donde estuvo siempre.

translation.en: Uh, but it's broken.
Preserved. It's staying here. Hmph!
Oh, shiny. Gold seal. Yeah. Yep, seems legit. My bad.
translation.es: Sello dorado y brillante. Sí, parece genuino. Me equivoqué.

translation.en: That was close. They almost got away with this vending machine.
translation.es: - Estuvo cerca. - Casi se llevan la máquina expendedora.

translation.en: Um, isn't it broken? Someone could say that about you, JJ.
translation.es: - ¿No está descompuesta? - Alguien podría decir eso de ti.

translation.en: Truth.
It doesn't matter if it's broken.
This is where we get our snacks,
for when we sit on the bench to look at the view.
translation.es: para cuando nos sentamos en el banco a apreciar la vista.

translation.en: Ooh, I'm on to something.
The vending machine, the view, it's all connected.
translation.es: La máquina expendedora, la vista... Todo está conectado.

translation.en: Don't you see? It's part of the whole experience.
translation.es: - Sí. - ¿No ven? ¡Es parte de la experiencia!

translation.en: If you take one thing out, everything is ruined. We need to keep, uh... Ah!
translation.es: Si sacan una cosa, todo se arruina. Debemos conservar...

translation.en: This leaky, old water fountain. Preserved.
And this puddle shaped like a rabbit. Preserved.
translation.es: Y este charco con forma de conejo. Preservado.

translation.en: Ah, yeah. Oh, okay, I get it.
Big Tony the Trash Can. Preserved.
Yeah! And this tree with purple leaves. Preserved.
translation.es: Sí, y este árbol con hojas violetas. Preservado.

translation.en: Even...
Chelsea, the chess- playing park man.  Preserved.
Oh, no, no, no, no, no. It's okay, it's okay.
You're not going anywhere. Can I call my family?
translation.es: - No irá a ninguna parte. - ¿Puedo llamar a mi familia?

translation.en: Friends, if we want the Sackenhack we know and love to stay the same, I mean, exactly the same,
translation.es: Si queremos que Sackenhack siga igual, digo, exactamente igual,

translation.en: we gotta stick shiny gold seals on everything.
translation.es: debemos pegarle sellos dorados y brillantes a todo.

translation.en: - Are you with me? - Locked and loaded.
We're expanding operations.
It's not just the big, obvious things.
translation.es: No son solo las cosas grandes y obvias.

translation.en: It's the tiny details that make Sackenhack special.
translation.es: Son los detalles que hacen especial a Sackenhack.

translation.en: And they need shiny gold seals, too.
Road safety tip 89.
Always keep your windows and mirrors clean to see everything.
translation.es: Tengan las ventanas y los espejos limpios.

translation.en: - Preserved. - Huh?
Hey, Bob.
Preserved. There.
Phew, we did it.
Everything that makes Sackenhack special is now safe from change forever. Whoo- hoo!
translation.es: Todo lo que hace especial a Sackenhack seguirá igual por siempre.

translation.en: What is all over this water fountain?
I wanna live with Dad!
Hey, hey! That's my baby!
They took my baby!
I didn't see the sign 'cause I don't...
translation.es: No vi la señal. Porque no sé... Ahora no sé...

translation.en: My baby!
translation.es: Porque no sé... Ahora no sé... ¡Mi bebé!

translation.en: Hold on. What kind of monster - would stick ducks together? -
translation.es: Esperen. ¿Qué clase de monstruo pegaría patos?

translation.en: What have we done? We've ruined Sackenhack.
Ugh. Our plan kind of backfired.
Totally.
I know whose fault this is.
Aw, Pinky. Don't blame yourself. It's that new talking stop sign.
translation.es: - Pinky, no te culpes. - Esa nueva señal de alto.

translation.en: If it wasn't for that thing, none of this would have happened.
translation.es: Si no fuera por esa cosa, esto no habría pasado.

translation.en: Yeah. Everything was fine until it showed up.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Todo estaba bien hasta que apareció.

translation.en: So much for modernization.
That stop sign is... It's... it's bad.
translation.es: Esa señal de alto es... Es... Es mala.

translation.en: Ugh! Real bad!
Yeah! That stop sign needs to pay.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Esa señal de alto debe pagar.

translation.en: - Stop. Stop. Stop... - You'd like that, wouldn't you?
You'd like us to stop, wouldn't you? Not today, stop sign!
translation.es: Quisieras que nos detuviéramos. ¡Hoy no, señal de alto!

translation.en: Get back in there, tiger!
Stop.
- Stop. Stop. Stop. - You tell him, Pinky!
- Stop. Stop. Stop. Stop. -
Safety tip number 500.
When the sun is low, watch out,
translation.es: Cuando baje el sol, ten cuidado

translation.en: 'cause the light might reflect off your rear view mirrors and blind--
translation.es: porque la luz podría reflejarse en los espejos...

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa!
translation.es: porque la luz podría reflejarse en los espejos... ¡Rayos!

translation.en: It's sun blindness!
Stop. Stop. Stop.
Did somebody say stop?
- Stop. Stop. Stop. - Oh, God.
- Stop. Stop. -
Oh! Pinky, are you all right? I nearly hit you.
Yeah, I'm... I'm fine. Thanks.
Thanks to that stop sign.
translation.es: Gracias a esa señal de alto.

translation.en: Stop.
Well, there's a lesson for us all in road safety.
translation.es: Es una lección en seguridad vial.

translation.en: Nice work, partner.
Air bags.
No!
- Oh, stop sign. - Stop.
No, no. I won't stop. I... I need to tell you--
translation.es: No. No me detendré. - Debo decirte... - Alto...

translation.en: - Stop... -
Save your breath. Save your breath, sweet little stop sign.
translation.es: No digas nada, dulce señal de alto.

translation.en: - Listen, I need to-- - Stop...
Dude, just let me say my thing.
I had you figured all wrong. You... You saved my life.
translation.es: Te entendí mal. Tú... me salvaste la vida.

translation.en: Stop...
- No, no, no, no, don't go! -
Goodbye, friend.
So, I guess nothing stays the same forever.
translation.es: Creo que nada sigue igual por siempre.

translation.en: Babs, JJ and I, we're gonna change. And Sackenhack will change with us.
translation.es: Babs, JJ y yo cambiaremos. Y Sackenhack cambiará con nosotros.

translation.en: But that's nothing to be scared of.
translation.es: Pero no hay que tener miedo.

translation.en: Uh, here's your new stop sign.  Stop. Stop...
translation.es: - Aquí está su nueva señal de alto. - Alto.

translation.en: Ooh! Sassy sign.
translation.es: - Aquí está su nueva señal de alto. - Alto. - Qué señal atrevida. - Alto...

translation.en: Stop. Stop...
Welcome to Sackenhack, new friend.
translation.es: - Bienvenida a Sackenhack, nueva amiga. - Alto.

translation.en: - Stop. - So sassy.
translation.es: - Bienvenida a Sackenhack, nueva amiga. - Alto. Qué atrevida.
